mapper.select: select b_no, b_title, u_nickname, b_time, b_hit from users,board where users.u_id = board.u_id
select u_nickname,b_no, b_title, b_content, (to_char(b_time,'yy/mm/dd hh:mi:ss'))as b_time from users, board where users.u_id = board.u_id and board.b_no = #{bno}
select a.u_nickname, b.c_content, (to_char(b.c_time, 'yy/mm/dd hh:mi:ss'))as c_time ,b_no from users a, comments b where a.u_id = b.u_id and b.b_no= #{bno} order by c_time
mapper.insert: insert into comments (c_no, c_time,c_content, b_no,u_id) values (comments_c_no_seq.nextval, sysdate, #{c_content},#{b_no},'id')
mapper.update: update board set b_title=#{b_title}, b_content = #{b_content} where b_no=#{b_no}
